My Projects



CRM Web App - Web Development

crm-web-demo.web.app

This is a CRM (Customer Relationship Manager) App built for Plasencia Cigars. They currently use it to manage their accounts. The app contains information about the accounts such as invoices, sales info, contact info. It also has the ability for users to submit orders for these accounts, as well as notes so other sales representatives can follow up and be aware of the current status of an account. This app also communicates with Quickbooks accounting software and transfers data automatically throughout the day.

It was built with React and the Firebase Suite (Firestore, Cloud Functions & Google Auth)

Rate Cigar Functionality - Web Development

tv.l-s.app (Phone Screen Size Only)

This is a product verification app, I built the functionality for the users to rate the products. I worked on both the front-end and back-end
I was provided with UI designs files, I developed the UI with Bootstrap 4 and React, using redux for state management and making calls to the backend with axios.
On the back-end I worked with LoopBack to automatically create an API service with routes and controllers, using PostgreSQL as a database.

Online E-Commerce Store - Web Development

cigarsbay.com

This is an online e-commerce cigar shop being built using the MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express, React & NodeJS). I developed the login & sign-up functionality from scratch, using jwson web tokens & bcrypt to achieve login persistance. Mongoose was used with MongoDB to handle models and schemas.

On the front end I used bootstrap 5 for quick and simple layout with slight style modifications. Redux was also implemented to handle the application states when loading data and interacting with the UI elements.

Currently hosted on heroku since it is a work process, expected to be functional by the end of the year. This shop will use paypal for payment processing, and admin page to handle users, orders and products.
